Today, Dan and Jordan discuss some strange goings-on in the present day of Alex Jones' show before taking a glimpse back into 2012 to speed through a bit of a stretch where Alex found himself in a "Gun Paranoia Holding Pattern."

==Tidbits==

*Gun paranoia holding pattern
*Alex calls for [[Piers Morgan]] to be deported
*Alex wants to start a new petition to bring treason charges against [[Dianne Feinstein]]
*Alex calls [[The Sandy Hook Elementary Massacre|Sandy Hook]] a false flag
*[[Doug Hagmann]] says expect more attacks
*[[Mike Adams]] hosts
*Guest: Kelly O'Meara, author of Psyched Out
*She doesn't have a psych degree
*Wrote for Insight magazine (owned by [[Sun Myung Moon]])
*wrote for CCHR (a Scientology front)
*Alex talks about his Satanist girlfriend
*New Years prediction: 2013 is the year America dies, they slit our throats
*Dan talks about moving
*Jordan talks about subletting
